resources.string:
Welcome to Into The Heavens For Android v0.6!

To start a new game, tap on your menu key and then tap on New Game.
To load an existing play-through, tap on your menu key and then tap on Load Game.
This save name appears to already exist. Do you want to replace the existing save?
